class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 26 - July 29, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Not only is France pivotal in the scientific history of public health and modern medicine, but concepts of health are embodied in French life styles that are only now seeking articulation in modern health discourse. The class explores these cultural influences on health and health policy.
sections: Class Nbr: 2228, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: F. Waseem, Status: Open
